/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars and pedestrians can be seen in the distance, adding life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
